name: broken physics (ink-droid)
description: its really bad and its my first try at making a game. I also decided to not follow any tutorials which might have been a bad idea. also I joined on the last day and I did not add much to game design. so ya I hope is't not that bad¯\_(ツ)_/¯. mostly though I hope yall like the music. the star was supposed to have a storyline that made it a duct tape star but I ran out of time¯\_(ツ)_/¯.
